name: Spin-Off Puppy Chow
author: Allison Paige
summary: Like puppy chow, but with a few different ingredients. Great for people who are allergic to peanuts or cannot have milk chocolate.
ingredients: 9 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex ®)
1 ½ cups confectioners sugar, or more to taste
directions: Place cereal squares in a bowl
Combine white chocolate chips, sunflower seed butter, and butter in a microwave-safe bowl; heat in microwave until melted and smooth, about 1 1/2 minutes
Stir chocolate mixture; add vanilla extract and stir
Pour chocolate mixture over cereal; stir to evenly coat
Add confectioners' sugar and stir until evenly coated
